sources.title: Flight of the Phoenix
sources.description:
Based on the works of Mikhail Bulgakov "Flight", "White Guard" and "Black Sea". The film tells about the flight from Russia at the end of the civil war of Russian people: the military, the nobles, the intelligentsia. The tragedy of the military general Khludov, who tore his soul with his own cruelty; the story of the Cossack general Chernoty, who turned into a beggar in a foreign land; personal drama of Serafima Korzukhina, who was betrayed by her husband and fell in love with the scientist Golubkov. The action takes place in Sevastopol, Constantinople and Paris.

IMDb rating: 7.8

Year of production: 1970

Directors: Alexander Alov, Vladimir Naumov
Writers: Alexander Alov, Vladimir Naumov
Composer: Nikolai Karetnikov
Cinematographer: Paatashvili Levan
Production designer: Alexey Parkhomenko

Cast: Alexander Yanvarev, Oleg Efremov, Evstigneev Evgeny, Alexei Batalov, Vladislav Dvorzhetsky, Vladimir Zamansky, Vladimir Basov, Mikhail Ulyanov, Vladimir Osenev, Tamara Loginova, Nikolai Sergeev, Tatyana Tkach, Lyudmila Savelieva, Pavel Springfeld, Stanislav Khitrov, Nikolai Olyalin , Freindlich Bruno, Khomyatov Roman, Roninson Gottlieb, Yudin Nikolay, Naumov Alexey, Drozdovskaya Mikaela

sources.title: The Flight | PART ONE | with spanish subtitles
sources.description:
Basado en las obras de Mikhail Bulgakov "Flight", "White Guard" y "Black Sea". La película cuenta la huida de Rusia al final de la guerra civil del pueblo ruso: los militares, los nobles, la intelectualidad. La tragedia del general militar Khludov, que desgarró su alma con su propia crueldad; la historia del general cosaco Chernoty, que se convirtió en mendigo en una tierra extranjera; drama personal de Serafima Korzukhina, quien fue traicionada por su esposo y se enamoró del científico Golubkov. La acción tiene lugar en Sebastopol, Constantinopla y París.

Calificación de IMDb: 7.8

Año de producción: 1970

Directores: Alexander Alov, Vladimir Naumov
Escritores: Alexander Alov, Vladimir Naumov
Compositor: Nikolái Karetnikov
Director de fotografía: Paatashvili Levan
Diseño de producción: Alexey Parkhomenko

Reparto: Alexander Yanvarev, Oleg Efremov, Evstigneev Evgeny, Alexei Batalov, Vladislav Dvorzhetsky, Vladimir Zamansky, Vladimir Basov, Mikhail Ulyanov, Vladimir Osenev, Tamara Loginova, Nikolai Sergeev, Tatyana Tkach, Lyudmila Savelieva, Pavel Springfeld, Stanislav Khitrov, Nikolai Olyalin, Freindlich Bruno, Khomyatov Roman, Roninson Gottlieb, Yudin Nikolay, Naumov Alexey, Drozdovskaya Mikaela

sources.title: The Flight | PART TWO | with spanish subtitles

metadata.Plot: A group of air crash survivors are stranded in the Mongolian desert with no chance of rescue. Facing a brutal environment, dwindling resources, and an attack by desert smugglers, they realize their only hope is doing the impossible... building a new plane from the wreckage of the old one.
metadata.Writer: Lukas Heller, Scott Frank, Edward Burns
metadata.Actors: Dennis Quaid, Miranda Otto, Giovanni Ribisi
